---
title: "Filtering variables"
output: html_document
date: "2023-10-02"
---
In this RMarkdown file all unnessasary variables are being deleted or renamed.

```{r}
# Deleting and renaming variables
filtered_merged_dataset <- merged_dataset_unique %>%
  filter(titleType.x == "movie")
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-isAdult.x)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-startYear.x, -endYear)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-tconst.y)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-genres.y)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-titleType.y)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-isAdult.y, -startYear.y)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-primaryTitle)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-runtimeMinutes.y)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-originalTitle)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-knownForTitles)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(tconst = tconst.x)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(titleType = titleType.x)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(genres = genres.x)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(runtimeMinutes = runtimeMinutes.x)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-titleType)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-primaryName)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(movie = name)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  rename(director_identifier = tconst)
filtered_merged_dataset <- filtered_merged_dataset %>%
  select(-nconst)
```
